function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on NOx-, SOx-related emissions and particle matter","Impact":"Increased risk to individual health and economic systems","Mitigation":"Increase research and study on the effects of these pollutants, focus on local and global impacts","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring devices, pollution control technologies","People":"Local communities, individuals, workers in pollution-heavy industries","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental agencies, government bodies"},{"Description":"Neglect of closed-loop supply chains and circular economy models in certain sectors","Impact":"Increased loss and waste, lack of sustainable material and food recovery, limited recycling","Mitigation":"Implement comprehensive metrics for loss and waste, promote circular economy models, incentivize recycling and recovery practices","Technologies":"Waste management technologies, recycling facilities, sustainable supply chain management systems","People":"Manufacturers, retailers, small businesses, consumers","Owner":"Businesses, government agencies, industry organizations"},{"Description":"Disruptions from outbreaks and other major external events","Impact":"Uncertainty, economic and logistical consequences, disruptions to supply chain operations","Mitigation":"Develop contingency plans, improve resilience in supply chains, enhance crisis response strategies","Technologies":"Disaster management systems, supply chain monitoring tools, crisis communication platforms","People":"Supply chain managers, logistics professionals, emergency response teams","Owner":"Companies, government agencies, emergency management organizations"}]}
